definition: to enjoy the present (idiom); to live happily with no thought for the future/make merry while you can/carpe diem
timely handling doubles the effect and halves the effort/the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
pinyin: ji2 shi2 chu3 li3 , shi4 ban4 gong1 bei4

sentences.english: Problems, if any, should be solved without delay.
Moni tor work quality and feedback abnormality to WT engineer.
sentences.chinese: 監督工作質量並及時向工程師反饋異常。

sentences.english: I think we'll just make it if we hurry up!
sentences.chinese: 如果抓點緊，我想我們能及時到達。

sentences.english: But users also ask about current events and many other subjects.
sentences.chinese: 但是用戶也會問及時事和許多其他的問題。

sentences.english: The result will be published in time once all data are processed.
sentences.chinese: 一俟數據處理完畢，這次普查的結果將及時公佈。

sentences.english: Only in this way ca fantastic I finish the work intime.
sentences.chinese: 唯有這樣我智力及時完成職責。

sentences.english: So in found that people with tonsillitis shall be timely treatment should be.
sentences.chinese: 因此在發現患有扁桃體炎時應及時予以治療。

sentences.english: But we do just in time planning.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們只進行及時的計劃。

sentences.english: And these various feedback mechanisms quickly facilitate jumpstarting the necessary people into action.
sentences.chinese: 這些反饋機制能夠及時協助有關人員迅速採取行動。

sentences.english: The result of occupational disease checkup should be announced to trade union.
sentences.chinese: 並及時向工會通報職業病檢查情況。

sentences.english: Fortunately, Ijurmped back in time to avoid being hit.
sentences.chinese: 很僥倖，我及時往後跳以免費遭撞擊。

sentences.english: Verifying the comprehensiveness and timeliness of the data in foreign-related revenue and expenditure declaration.
sentences.chinese: 覈查涉外收支申報數據全面性和及時性。
及時的一根針救了九條命？

sentences.english: A Stitch in Time Saves Nine Billion.
sentences.chinese: 及時一秒勝過事後九億秒。

sentences.english: The driver clapped on the brakes but failed to stop in time.
sentences.chinese: 司機急忙踩住剎車，但沒有及時把車停住。

sentences.english: Invalidity: The invalidity of the contract is due to your unpunctual delivery of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 合同的失效是由於你方交貨不及時造成的。

definition: timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
at any time/at all times/at the right time
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
